name: nestjs-boilerplate
description: Opinated Serverless Boilertplate Based on NestJS and Written in TypeScript

scripts.update:patch: ncu -u --semverLevel minor && npm i && npm audit fix
scripts.update:minor: ncu -u --semverLevel major && npm i && npm audit fix
scripts.update:major: ncu -u && npm i && npm audit fix --force
scripts.update:boilerplate: git fetch boilerplate && git merge boilerplate/master --allow-unrelated-histories
scripts.orm:schema:sync:gen:dev: npm run orm:cache:reset && npm run orm:schema:sync:gen
scripts.orm:schema:sync:gen:stg: npm run orm:cache:reset && cp-cli .env.stg dist/.env && npm run orm:schema:sync:gen
scripts.orm:schema:sync:gen:prd: npm run orm:cache:reset && cp-cli .env.prd dist/.env && npm run orm:schema:sync:gen
scripts.orm:schema:sync:gen: mikro-orm schema:update --dump && mikro-orm migration:create && npm run orm:schema:sync:help
scripts.orm:schema:sync:help: echo Review generated schema sync migration at: && echo ./dist/migration/Migration*.js && echo. && echo If everything is correct, apply changes by executing: && echo npm run orm:schema:sync:run
